name: Lost in the forest (horror-novel)
description:
The group of people went to the forest but  a few kilometers later before highway the car's battery was discharged.

There are only 500 meters to the road on the map but for some reason finding a way out is not so easy.
Something is wrong in this forest.

-A special plot
-Realistic physics
- The end of the game depends on your actions
-The plot is performed by three characters
